entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as a wizard by Aunt Petunia. The text states 'You knew I'm a - a wizard?' and Harry responds with surprise.

entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia is mentioned as the sister of Lily Potter and the one who raised Harry. She is described as someone who knew about magic but tried to hide it.

relationships.description: Aunt Petunia is Harry's aunt, as mentioned in the text 'my dratted sister being what she was'.
